title: clone-module input
description: Input schema of the clone-module action

module.title: Module ID
module.description: The identifier of the module to be cloned

node.title: Node ID
node.description: Node identifier where the clone is created

replace.title: Replace flag
replace.description: If set to true, the clone receives the original UUID and the original module is erased. If false, the clone is just a copy of the original module.
